title: Pvp.net Client Invisible Bug
body:
I've had this bug since I started playing the game back in 2012. When I launch the LoLLauncher or w.e it is, it takes a little longer than normal to load up, but I can click Launch anyways. But after I click launch, there is a long delay followed by the current audio for the Login Screen. However, everything is invisible. The client is PHYSICALLY there ( I can't click the things under it ) but it's invisible. I can even hover over the screen til i find where to enter my password (from memory) and login, but then the home page is invisible too. 

I've seen discussions on this dating back to 2011, and from what I've seen, no matter how many bumps or upvotes it gets the problem is never answered.

I've tried 
1) Reinstalling
2) Deleting certain folders in the league folder (as mentioned in various other discussions) 
3) Launching as admin (duh)
4) Trying different compatibility setting on LoLclient.exe and other exe's.
5) Using a new computer.

Though I had this problem for a while years ago, it fixed itself over time. 
I suspect it was updating my graphics drivers.
HOWEVER, I needed to role back my graphics driver because with updated graphics, my screen has flickering black bars in game (ANOTHER problem I've seen discussed but not fixed).

So either, I have to deal with one BIG problem and can't play
or I have to deal with another BIG problem and pretty much not play either.

Any helps would be appreciated, but i honestly believe this is a problem only Riot themselves can fix.

replies.body:
Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em. Let us know if the exterminator worked or if the bugs are still...bugging you. 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/khazix_deathblossom_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=re5tY9ln https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2014/12/Death-Blossom-Elise.jpg

There are some great first steps in this guide. However, since this issue isn't something we see often, I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new.) with our tech specialists if you see no change in the issue.

Attaching a set of [Hextech Repair Tool logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) will give our techs the context necessary to work with you and resolve this for good.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Update: I just updated my graphics drivers again, which I knew would work. Needless to say, I can now launch the game, but I cannot play in fullscreen ( as I mentioned above ).

I tried most of the things on the Exterminator page, but nothing has fixed the blinking on Fullscreen mode.

While I can still play on borderless mode, I don't feel it's fair that I should be subjected to having to deal with the lower fps and abuse of my already old computer's hardware.

In this case, I feel it's best to reach out to our techs through [a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look into getting everything functioning normally again. Be sure to attach a set of logs using our Toolkit as I previously mentioned so they have all the context to resolve this quickly!
